sourcesContent:
import React,{useState,useContext} from "react"; import Tuscany from '../DB/Tuscany.json'; // import grp from '../assets/home/icons/grp.png'; import drtn from '../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/duration.svg' import lctn from '../assets/home/icons/location.svg'; import gd from '../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/guide.svg' import ln from '../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/language.svg' import fs from '../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/ticket.svg' // import trnsprt from '../assets/home/icons/icons_tours/transport.svg' import DatePicker from "../components/DatePicker/DatePicker"; import { ToursContext } from "../context/ToursContext"; export default function SpecificTour () { const [id,title,price,short_description,details,suration,] = useContext(ToursContext); const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()); return(
{Tuscany.map((tour)=> (

{tour.title}

from

{tour.price}

{tour.short_description}

Date
Time

Details

{tour.details}

{/*

Number of group:{Tuscany.people}

*/}

Duration:{tour.duration}

Departuring and arriving areas:{tour.departure}

Guide service:{tour.service}

Language:{tour.language}

Entry Fees:{tour.fees}

{/*

Entry Transportation:{Tuscany.transport}

*/}
))}
{/*
*/}
) }
